name: Burden (itch) (AbsurdGames)
description:
This story is dedicated to Nobody and it never should be dedicated to anyone else. There is no other reason for this story to exist, but to cause guilt. Let your Burden be your guide.

I am currently writing my new book and I decided to make a short game about the first chapter.  Game was created in two weeks using Unity free assets.

This is my first time making games so any feedback would be useful.

I hope you will enjoy.

You inspect objects with LMB.

If you like the game you can buy me a beer by donating.
